name: Color Dream (itch)
description:
Everything turned grey, only the brave princess Daphny can retrieve the three Color Crystals and save the world!

  • Play as Daphny the fairy princess and paint the world
  • Explore three different areas: Red Canyon, Green Forest and Blue Ocean
  • Perform a series of double jumps in order to reach new heights
  • Use your magical power to recolor white platforms
  • Collect all the Color Crystals and bring them back to the Color Sanctuary

This game was made in 96 hours with the theme "Lost & Found".

Game Design ‒ Devitini Casnedi Matteo, Lomazzi Marco, Podini Mattia

Level Design ‒ Baldassi Lorenzo, Rainoldi Giulio, Ronco Federico

3D Art ‒ Folino Giada, Nespoli Lucrezia, Zoggia Giulia

Programming ‒ Casagrande Luca, Giacomini Luca, Saullo Giuseppe

Sound Design ‒ Mainardi Marco, Pagani Alberto
